Articles.Content:
Hello, and welcome to my thread!

So, the ship I am trying to show you is my favorite Probe/ship and its lander variant. This is quite minimalistic, with only around 120 parts. It has gone to:

-Mun (orbit and landing)

-Minmus (orbit and landing)

-Duna (orbit and landing)

-Ike (orbit)

-Eve (orbit and landing)

-Dres (orbit)

-Jool (orbit)

-Laythe (orbit)

-Tylo (orbit)

As you can see, this ship can go pretty much everywhere, if needed! Fuel is not an issue with this ship, as it has gone to all of these places with fuel to spare! Thanks for reading this post, and I would be more than happy if you could critique it and tell me how to improve on it. Thank you so much!

Here is an imgur album, all about the ship: Imgur Album

Please note that the pictures of the ship in the album have been taken a while ago, so some of them may be outdated, without the upgrades of the current ship.

Here is the mediafire download link: Voyager II Exploration Probe

Voyager II Experimental Landing Craft

Edited April 21, 2013 by Mekris28
Fixed the links :P
You've got the link text and address portions of the URL tags backwards there.
So how do you guys like it?
Again, I am very much open to improvements. Thanks for downloading
Nice job. It's very much like the old-school ships most of us oldtimers used to make back in .13.
I like it, very practical. One improvement I might suggest is making it so you can detach and reattach the lander to the interplanetary transfer stage. That would allow even more versatility.

Here's a couple of mine

My First Reliable Interplanetary Craft, the Nightmare III

Anymore I use the Pluto I (below)

Edited April 24, 2013 by wolfedg

So how do you guys like it?

Pretty nice! It climbs well and handles nicely with the RCS on. I found out the hard way though, you don't have a ladder on the hatch.
Haven't flown this yet but I notice it's a manned probe. Does it have enough fuel to get the guy from these exotic locales?

No, I will have to make a ladder for the lander, and I am aware that it is a manned probe. I have not tested the return trips for my journeys, but I am highly doubtful that it can make a return trip from any 'exotic' locales (as in Dres, Tylo, Laythe, etc.)

My First Reliable Interplanetary Craft, the Nightmare III

/snip

That name is a work of genius.
Does anyone have some improvements about the ship? Have you guys been to anyplace really cool with this ship? I'd like to hear what you think.

I love these ships, really they are the first to help me learn to orbit and maneuver to the Mun and Minmus I even just spent 2 days trying to find this thread again xD

As for improvements I don't see much that needs improving... But that is m so you never know.
